ygData.subject: RE: Yet another "Where Should I Hunt?" question....
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, great information!  Thanks for the tips.  I ve been hunting with a steady group (mostly fellow guild members) since the low teens.  We will definitely
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, great information! Thanks for the tips. I've been hunting with a
steady group (mostly fellow guild members) since the low teens. We will
definitely benefit from this!

I appreciate it,
Olatan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: PHAEDRA WHITLOCK [mailto:PWHITLOCK@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, January 11, 2000 10:11 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Yet another "Where Should I Hunt?"
> question....
>
>
> From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
>
> South Karana. Hunt aviaks, centaurs and elephants until you can
> get into outside Paw Groups. Ive levelled from 22 to nearly 28
> (last night) in about 3 weeks at Paw. The loot is good (FS
> weapons, whips sell for 30-50, gloves for 300-500, other Paw
> armor 10-15) and the money isnt bad, plat, gold and silver.
>
> Also try Crushbone Throneroom, aviaks in Rathe, Rathe Mountains
> (Gt skels), OOT Aviaks and possibly gargoyle, Unrest, Sol A,
> Najena, Everfrost mammoths (tusks sell amiable cha 100 for over
> 10 plat), Perma by the zone... Dunno if Befallen is still an
> option but Highpass maybe, and if you get sow or a druid hunting
> partner you can kite some of the griffs in EKarana, or try the
> spiders there if no Sow.
>
> Also Pickclaws in HighHold Keep maybe.
>
> Luckily you can travel around, and you will need to. 20 wasnt TOO
> bad for me, but 22 I couldnt find open hunting spots anywhere,
> till Paw was revamped. Pretty much havent left there since except
> to bank... Bind spot is at the merchant by the Bank, Gate to NK,
> run back. 5 minutes away time.
>
> Good hunting
>
> Shannyn, lvl 27 and 80% on Tunare
>
>
>
>
